====Definitions====
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[give]]
#: {{zh-x|給 你 一個 吻|'''give''' you a kiss}}
# [[for]]; for the benefit of
#: {{zh-x|我 給 你 按摩 吧。|Let me do a massage '''for''' you.}}
# [[to]]; [[with]] {{gloss|following verbs to indicate the handing over or passing of something}}
#: {{zh-x|這裡 有 我 一直 想 說 給 你 聽 的 話。|Here are the words I've always wanted to say '''to''' you.}}
# [[to]] {{gloss|introduce recipient of an action}}
#: {{zh-x|給 他 道歉！|Apologise '''to''' him!}}
# [[by]] {{gloss|marker of passive voice}}
#: {{zh-x|我們 都 給 人 騙 了。|We all '''got''' fool'''ed'''.}}
# {{n-g|Used in the form of {{zh-l|給[[我]]}} in imperative sentences for emphasis.}}
#: {{zh-x|你 給我 閉嘴！|Shut '''the fuck''' up!}}
